title: Wills and estate documents (may return SUPERSEDED)
dataVerified: Testator name, beneficiaries, executor name, asset details, witness signatures, will date, revision number (if applicable)
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: SUPERSEDED status critical for updated wills - prevents execution of outdated wills. Prevents forgery of testamentary documents. Estate disputes require verifiable will authenticity. Human-readable format essential for legal interpretation. Multi-page wills benefit from per-page hash verification to prevent page substitution attacks. Witness signature blocks particularly benefit from OCR-to-hash verification. Domain binding to attorney or court ensures authenticity.
